import sys
def main():
    test_cases = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split(' '))
    contents_of_a = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split(' '))
    min_of_a = min(contents_of_a)
    max_of_a = max(contents_of_a)
    # print min_of_a,max_of_a
    for query in range(test_cases[1]):
        t = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
        if min_of_a <= t and t<=max_of_a:
            print 'Yes'
        else:
            print 'No'

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
